name: The Last Bastion (Nidel)
description:
Synopsis

The alien invasion but one thing is sure. You won't fall alone! Let's create as much chaos as possible!

How to create chaos?

  1. Left click to shoot, don't get to greedy or you'll get jammed for a short time.
  2. Aim for the power source to overload the engine and create a massive explosion.
  3. Aim for bombs and destroy your only serious threat!

Produced for

MiniJam 100 - Overload, Limitation: Chaos is everything

Credits

  • Music: "orbiting neptune" by bibby from https://freemusicarchive.org/
